__e: And besides, I wouldn't think of going without paying my respects to major Crail.
I must also pay tribute to the work of our partner companies.
And saluting the captain makes him a target for Germans.
Well, if it's all right with you, we'd like about 10 minutes to say hello to the boys here.
I'll be dogged. I never heard of saluting no woman before.
I would like to begin by extending greetings from the other Members of the Committee, who could not be here today.
I am going to give you an hour to say goodbye to the Queen.
Your Honor... gentlemen of the jury... I am the first to bow to achievement.
